substantial drop.from sentence: Next , we observe a substantial drop when removing tokenspecific attentions over the query in the GA module , which allow gating individual tokens in the document only by parts of the query relevant to that token rather than the over all query representation .

character embeddings.from sentence: Finally , removing the character embeddings , which were only used for WDW and CBT , leads to a reduction of about 1 % in the performance .
